                  :mod (r / represent-01)

comment: top to bottom , left to right , put words together to form sentences , Tylenol for any headaches , Midol for cramps .
amr:
# ::snt top to bottom , left to right , put words together to form sentences , Tylenol for any headaches , Midol for cramps .
(a / and
      :op1 (t / top-to-bottom)
      :op2 (l / left-to-right)
      :op3 (p / put-01
            :ARG1 (w / word)
            :ARG2 (t2 / together)
            :purpose (f / form-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (s / sentence)))
      :op4 (p2 / product
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Tylenol")
            :purpose (h / headache
                  :mod (a2 / any)))
      :op5 (p3 / product
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Midol")
            :purpose (c / cramp-01)))
